Home.title: Hello, I am Jabin
Home.description: Full Stack Developer / UI Designer / Creator

About.title: About Me
About.intro1: I'm a Software Engineer with 2 years of full-stack development experience, passionate about scalable web and mobile applications. I specialize in React.js, C#, Node.js, and Swift, with expertise in Docker-based deployments, AWS cloud services, and RESTful API design.
About.intro2: I have worked on innovative projects, such as developing a medication automation app using AI-powered image recognition, and contributed to MERN Stack applications integrating Spotify & OpenAI APIs. I thrive in agile environments, ensuring CI/CD optimization, clean code, and performance-driven solutions.
About.curent: Currently, I am focused on enhancing my skills in machine learning and cloud computing, with a keen interest in exploring the latest advancements in AI and their applications in software development.

list.title: Medimate - AI-powered Medication Assistance
list.description: Developed an innovative application that automates medication purchases by extracting data from product images using AI-driven image recognition.

list.title: MusicChat - AI-Enhanced Social Music Platform
list.description: Built a full-stack web application integrating Spotify and OpenAI APIs, allowing users to review, chat, and discover music interactively.

list.title: COVID-19 Impact Analysis with Machine Learning
list.description: Conducted data mining on COVID-19's effect on education in Venezuela using CRISP-DM methodology, building ML models to predict school dropout rates.

Contact.description: I am always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision. Feel free to reach out!
